summary: Adds a news set of chitin armor that looks exactly like heavy chitin cuirass and heavy chitin gauntlets.
descriptionHtml: I made a new set of cuirass and gauntlets that look exactly like heavy chitin armor. I made this for myself, so its going to have a higher rating than most light armor. But mostly, its because in my search for perfect armor, I wanted to match the light and heavy chitin armor to take advantage of light armor perks. Hope you guys enjoy and tell me if there\'s a problem.
author: mitchellwebb1990
